languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую бонусную единицу Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Strength describes how physically strong the character is. It affects the damage the character inflicts with melee weapons, or allows to lift heavier objects. For each Strength bonus point characters deal 1 additional damage with melee weapons.
It also affects the Athletics skill.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}代表角色身体的强壮程度。力量会影响角色使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，也可以让角色搬起更重的物件。每有1点力量{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的单手近战武器伤害提高5%，双手近战武器伤害提高10%。
此外，力量还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}技能。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}代表角色身体的强壮程度。力量会影响角色使用近战武器造成的伤害，也可以让角色搬起更重的物件。每有1点力量{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色使用近战武器造成的伤害就会提高1点。
此外，力量还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} (FUE) describe lo fuerte que es un personaje físicamente. Afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que el personaje inflige con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y le permite levantar objetos más pesados. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Fuerza, el personaje inflige un 5 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo de una mano y un 10 % más con armas cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos.
También afecta a la habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) describes how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
La Fuerza ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}) describe lo fuerte que es un personaje físicamente. Afecta al daño que el personaje inflige con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo y le permite levantar objetos más pesados. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Fuerza, el personaje inflige 1 punto más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g} .

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}（STR）はキャラクターの物理的な強さを示す。キャラクターが近接武器で与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}量に影響し、重いオブジェクトを持ち上げることができる。腕力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、片手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器によるダメージが1追加され、ダメージが5%増加する。両手武器の場合、このボーナスは2倍になり、腕力ボーナス1点につき追加ダメージ2点、追加ダメージ10%になる。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}スキルにも影響する。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) describes how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 1 additional damage and 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons. For two-handed weapons this bonus is doubled to 2 additional damage and 10% additional damage for each point of Strength Bonus.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
腕力（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}）はキャラクターの物理的な強さを示す。キャラクターが近接武器で与えるダメージ量に影響し、重いオブジェクトを持ち上げることができる。腕力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、近接武器によるダメージが1追加される。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую единицу бонуса Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) describes how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на урон, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусную{/g} единицу Силы персонаж наносит 1 дополнительный урон рукопашным оружием.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на урон, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусную{/g} единицу Силы персонаж наносит 1 дополнительный урон рукопашным оружием.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} (STÄ) gibt die körperliche Stärke eines Charakters an. Sie wirkt sich auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus, den ein Charakter mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} verursacht, und ermöglicht ihm, schwerere Gegenstände zu heben. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}punkt an Stärke verursachen Charaktere mit einhändigen Nahkampfwaffen 5 %, mit zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffen 10 % mehr Schaden.
Wirkt sich auch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} aus.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Stärke ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}) beschreibt, wie stark ein Charakter körperlich ist. Sie wirkt sich auf den Schaden aus, den ein Charakter mit Nahkampfwaffen anrichtet, und ermöglicht es ihm, schwerere Gegenstände zu heben. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonuspunkt{/g} an Stärke fügen Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen 1 Zusatzschaden zu.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} (STÄ) gibt die körperliche Stärke eines Charakters an. Sie wirkt sich auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus, den ein Charakter mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} verursacht, und ermöglicht ihm, schwerere Gegenstände zu heben. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}punkt an Stärke verursachen Charaktere mit einhändigen Nahkampfwaffen 5 %, mit zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffen 10 % mehr Schaden.
Wirkt sich auch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} aus.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} (FOR) représente la force physique d'un personnage. Elle détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il inflige avec les armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} et lui permet de soulever des objets lourds. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Force, les personnages infligent 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à une main et 10 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à deux mains.
Elle influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

Elle influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}.
